short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A letter mirroring Chrome extension for dyslexics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use cases:
- Mirror letters on websites with a click and read with ease. Suitable for dyslexics. 
- Simulates the dyslexia experience and experiment with character substitution. 

Keywords: letter, alphabet, character, word, mirror, mirroring, substitution, dyslexia, dyslexic.
